      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      (package private) boolean CanStart
      Boolean tracks if the host can start the game or not.
      (package private) SingletonUser currUser
      SingletonUser instance which stores the currently logged in user.
      (package private) java.lang.String GameMode
      String holds what gamemode a user is playing.
      (package private) android.widget.Button GameSettingsBtn
      Button displays game settings menu.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView HostOptions
      TextView displays host options prompt.
      (package private) java.lang.String HostOrJoin
      String stores if the user is the host of the lobby or if they joined the lobby.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView LeaveLobbyError
      TextView displays error messages caused when leaving the lobby.
      (package private) java.lang.String LobbyCode
      String stores the of the lobby the user is currently in.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView LobbyCodeText
      TextView displays the lobby code.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView LobbyError
      TextView displays error messages caused by some event within the lobby.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView LobbyEvent
      TextView displays the most recent event that occurred within the lobby.
      (package private) android.widget.LinearLayout LobbyMembersLayout
      LinearLayout container displaying all lobby members and relevant information about them.
      (package private) java.lang.String lobbyMessage
      String stores a message about the most recent change of roles, ready status, etc within the lobby.
      (package private) android.widget.LinearLayout LobbyOverlay
      LinearLayout container for the lobby overlay displayed upon closing of the lobby.
      (package private) android.widget.ImageButton LobbyToHostJoin
      Button takes user back to the host or join lobby screen.
      (package private) android.widget.ImageButton NotReadyBtn
      ImageButton changes user's ready status to "NotReady" if user is not a spectator.
      (package private) android.widget.Button Player1Btn
      Button changes user's player type to Player1.
      (package private) android.widget.Button Player2Btn
      Button changes user's player type to Player2.
      (package private) java.lang.String PlayerOrSpectator
      String stores the user's player type.
      (package private) android.widget.ImageButton ReadyBtn
      ImageButton changes user's ready status to "Ready" if user is not a spectator.
      (package private) android.widget.TextView ReadyStatus
      TextView displays ready up/unready prompt.
      (package private) android.widget.Button SpectatorBtn
      Button changes user's player type to Spectator.
      (package private) android.widget.Button StartGameBtn
      Button starts the game for all users in the lobby.
      (package private) java.lang.String URLConcatenation
      String stores the ending of the URL path mapping for the websocket.
      (package private) boolean UserReady
      Boolean tracks if the user is currently readied up or not.
      private org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient WebSocket
      WebSocket used for connecting to the lobby, leaving the lobby, changing from spectator to player, changing user ready status, and kicking other lobby members from the lobby if user is the host.
      (package private) java.lang.String WhoPlayer1
      String stores which lobby member is currently assigned player type "Player1"
      (package private) java.lang.String WhoPlayer2
      String stores which lobby member is currently assigned player type "Player2"

    • Field Detail

      • ReadyStatus

        android.widget.TextView ReadyStatus
        TextView displays ready up/unready prompt.

      • HostOptions

        android.widget.TextView HostOptions
        TextView displays host options prompt.

      • LobbyCodeText

        android.widget.TextView LobbyCodeText
        TextView displays the lobby code.

      • LeaveLobbyError

        android.widget.TextView LeaveLobbyError
        TextView displays error messages caused when leaving the lobby.

      • LobbyError

        android.widget.TextView LobbyError
        TextView displays error messages caused by some event within the lobby.

      • LobbyEvent

        android.widget.TextView LobbyEvent
        TextView displays the most recent event that occurred within the lobby.

      • LobbyToHostJoin

        android.widget.ImageButton LobbyToHostJoin
        Button takes user back to the host or join lobby screen.

      • Player1Btn

        android.widget.Button Player1Btn
        Button changes user's player type to Player1.

      • Player2Btn

        android.widget.Button Player2Btn
        Button changes user's player type to Player2.

      • SpectatorBtn

        android.widget.Button SpectatorBtn
        Button changes user's player type to Spectator.

      • NotReadyBtn

        android.widget.ImageButton NotReadyBtn
        ImageButton changes user's ready status to "NotReady" if user is not a spectator.

      • ReadyBtn

        android.widget.ImageButton ReadyBtn
        ImageButton changes user's ready status to "Ready" if user is not a spectator.

      • StartGameBtn

        android.widget.Button StartGameBtn
        Button starts the game for all users in the lobby. Viewable only by the host of the lobby.

      • GameSettingsBtn

        android.widget.Button GameSettingsBtn
        Button displays game settings menu. Viewable only by the host of the lobby.

      • GameMode

        java.lang.String GameMode
        String holds what gamemode a user is playing. Gamemodes are chess, chessboxing, or boxing.

      • LobbyCode

        java.lang.String LobbyCode
        String stores the of the lobby the user is currently in.

      • HostOrJoin

        java.lang.String HostOrJoin
        String stores if the user is the host of the lobby or if they joined the lobby.

      • PlayerOrSpectator

        java.lang.String PlayerOrSpectator
        String stores the user's player type. Player types are Player1, Player2, or Spectator.

      • WhoPlayer1

        java.lang.String WhoPlayer1
        String stores which lobby member is currently assigned player type "Player1"

      • WhoPlayer2

        java.lang.String WhoPlayer2
        String stores which lobby member is currently assigned player type "Player2"

      • lobbyMessage

        java.lang.String lobbyMessage
        String stores a message about the most recent change of roles, ready status, etc within the lobby.

      • URLConcatenation

        java.lang.String URLConcatenation
        String stores the ending of the URL path mapping for the websocket.

      • LobbyOverlay

        android.widget.LinearLayout LobbyOverlay
        LinearLayout container for the lobby overlay displayed upon closing of the lobby.

      • LobbyMembersLayout

        android.widget.LinearLayout LobbyMembersLayout
        LinearLayout container displaying all lobby members and relevant information about them. The display of the lobby members changes depending on if the user is the host or member of the lobby.

      • UserReady

        boolean UserReady
        Boolean tracks if the user is currently readied up or not.

      • CanStart

        boolean CanStart
        Boolean tracks if the host can start the game or not.

      • currUser

        SingletonUser currUser
        SingletonUser instance which stores the currently logged in user.

      • WebSocket

        private org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient WebSocket
        WebSocket used for connecting to the lobby, leaving the lobby, changing from spectator to player, changing user ready status, and kicking other lobby members from the lobby if user is the host.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate​(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - If the activity is being re-initialized after previously being shut down then this Bundle contains the data it most recently supplied in ComponentActivity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle). Note: Otherwise it is null. Loads lobby screen onto device. Certain views and buttons will be disabled or hidden based on user's player type and role within the lobby.

        private void spectatorJoined​(java.lang.String[] strings)
        Updates client that spectator has joined.
        Parameters:
        strings - is a string array containing the information of which user has just joined the lobby.

      • displayLobbyEvent

        private void displayLobbyEvent​(java.lang.String[] strings)
        Displays lobby event at top of screen.
        Parameters:
        strings - is a string array containing the information of what change in the lobby status has just occurred.

      • displayLobbyMembers

        private void displayLobbyMembers​(java.lang.String[] listMembers)
        Displays who is in the lobby and what their corresponding player type and or ready status are.
        Parameters:
        listMembers - is a string array containing the information of all lobby members, their player type, and their ready status if applicable.
